**Enterprise Network**

Don't miss out on our premium network blend including Level 3, Telia Sonera, NTT, GTT, Cogent, Zayo, HE, and Eonix Communications.

Dallas Test IP: 50.2.217.106
New York City Test IP: 104.140.200.255

**Support**

You always have a way of getting help. Whether it's LiveChat, Ticket, Phone, Email, or even Skype. We also have routine checkups to ensure you are happy with your server!

**Control Panel**

We provide a secure, fast, smooth, and easy to use control panel with every dedicated server. Here are the key features of our control panel:

Bandwidth usage graphs
OS Reinstall (CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, Windows Server, much more!)
Hardware Information
Power Control
NoVNC KVM Console

Feel free to contact me for a tour of our panel before purchasing!
